StringValues.16: A claw-like device used to remove elemental stones from the Isparian weaponry. Having been carved from a diamond heart infused with the essence of nullification, it is a sturdy device.
StringValues.14: Use this on an Isparian weapon set with a stone to remove the stone from the weaponry.
StringValues.15: A claw-like device used to remove elemental stones from the Isparian weaponry.
